data.title: southcinema lyrics: Nijam Telugu Movie Lyrics
data.meta_description: Chandamama Rave Songs Lyrics     Movie : Nijam   Songs : Chandamama Rave   Singers : RP Patnaik,Usha   Lyricist : Kula Sekhar        ...
data.text:
Chandamama Rave Songs Lyrics

Movie : Nijam

Songs : Chandamama Rave

Singers : RP Patnaik,Usha

Lyricist : Kula Sekhar

[Female]

chandamaama raave jaabilli raave

kondekki raave gogupoolu theve

mabbulekki raave manchi gandham theve

pallaki lo raave paarijaatham theve

[Male]

chandamaama raave jaabilli raave

chandamaama raave jaabilli raave

kondekki raave gogupoolu theve

[Male]

thalli thene paataki thalladilli poke

kallabolli matalaki kalavaramendhuke

manshula maataki nilakada ledhule

asali nela pai nijame ledhule

chandamaama raake jaabilli raake

[Chorus]

chandamaama raave gunde kotha chudave

dhayi dhayi dhaave dhaarunaalu chudave

manchithanammandhi andhanantha dhooram

neethi leni nela pai nijame neram

yendhukante adigithe jarigini goram

chandamaama raave gunde kotha chudave

dhayi dhayi dhaave dhaarunaalu chudave

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Rattalu Ratalu Songs Lyrics

Movie : Nijam

Songs : Ratalu

Singers : Mahesh Babu,Teja,Usha,Mani Chandra,RP Patnaik

Lyricist : Kulasekhar

[Male]

rathaalu rathaalu ne dhaggara unna rasallo oka rasam iyyave

[Female]

yedishavvu dammidi ki value seyyavu

nekendhuku ra nujiveedu rasalu

[Male]

please ye

[Female]

dammidi kodaka neku naaneti ra itcheddhi

[Male]

abba atta kaadhe ninnu muttukunte na vollantha jivvuantadhi

[Female]

ne paade yettha yenti raa aa navvu

nannu muttukonte shock kotti chasthavu yedava

[Male]

okkasari muttukoni chacchi pothaane please ye rathaalu

[Mahesh]

thatha atta kadhu thatha adigedhi

nenu adigi pedhatha chudu

[Male]

rathaalu rathaalu nujiveedu rathaalu isthaava isthaava

rathaalu rathaalu kodipunjulisthaanu vasthaava vasthaava

nuvvu gaani pettukunte eyetex katuka isthaa

nuvvu gown vesukunte lo neck jacket isthaa

madha mancham madichi petti vacheyi vacheyi vacheyi

hoyi hoyi

rathaalu rathaalu nujiveedu rathaalu isthaava isthaava

rathaalu rathaalu kodipunjulisthaanu vasthaava vasthaava

[Female]

habbababa ranu ranu naanu ranu vogeyyavayyo

kadhu kadhu veelukadhu kudharadhayyo

[Mahesh]

yente vere paataloki vellipoyyavvu

nuvvu muyyi orey nuvvu veyyi

[Male]

thakkuvemi kaadhe ni soku sampadha

enthavarikaina

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Neelo Unadi Sonmg Lyricks

Movie : Nijam

Songs : Neelo Unadi

Singers : RP Patnaik,Usha

Lyricist : Kula Sekhar

[Male]

neelo vunnadhi nenena nenena nenena

[Female]

mana iddharidhi premena premena premena

[Male]

mana premalo nijamannadhi koluvundhi le

[Female]

mana janta ni adhi andhuke kalipindhi le

[Male]

neelo vunnadhi nenena nenena nenena

[Female]

mana iddharidhi premena premena premena

[Male]

sedha theerithe priyuraali needalo

baadhalanna matalinka cheralevu le

[Female]

maata ladithe manasaina vaaditho

mandutenda manchu laaga maaruthundhi le

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Chi Chi Songs Lyrics

Movie : Nijam

Songs title : Che Che Songs

Singers : RP Patnaik,Usha

Lyricist : Kula Sekhar

[Male]

chichi ante chichi antavu

popo ante popo antavu

nenedhante nuvvadhi antavu

o o o o

[Female]

hey hey ante hey hey anta

hu hu ante hu hu anta

nuvvedhante nenadhi anta

o o o o

[Male]

nepai istam ledhannaaka

natho kastam antunnaga

prema doma levvannaga

o o o o

chi po chiraku naaku

pai pai kalaga raaku

natho panenti neeku

challe badayi poku

chichi ante chichi antavu

popo ante popo antavu

o o o o

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Illage Illage Songs Lyricks

Movie : Nijam

Song : Illage Illage

Singers : RP Patnaik,Usha

Lyricist : Kula sekhar

[Female]

ilage ilage ilage

ninne cherukuntanilage

idhe premani marem kaadhani

priya sootiga cheppaleva

kalem kaadhani yedhe needhani

ila gundelo vaalipova

ilage ilage ilage

ninne cherukuntanilage

gaali lo ni peruni raasi

oohalo ni cheyyini thaaki

yenthaga murisindho chudu ayyo papam nalo premaa

[Male]

yemito ee thiyyani bhadha

mouname bhadhulanukoleva

maatale mari sariga raavu

yemayyindho naakivela

[Female]

vullo vaalu dhinnenayyo premantaaru

[Male]

avuna naaku cheppevaru lene leru

[Female]

mari moyyaku kadhe allaku

priya neeku cheppanu nenu

[Male]

idhe premani ivaale kadha

nijam thelusukunnanu nenu

[Female]

ilage ilage ilage

ninne cherukuntanilage

[Male]

ippude o vintha ni chusa

cheppina nuvvu nammavu telusa

nammithe oka sari itu choodu

nalo vundhi nuvve telusa

[Female]

indhulo arey vinthemundhi

mundhuga idhi raasevundhi

anthaga aa maataki vasthe

nalo vundhi nuvve telusa

[Male]

nuvvu nenu yekam ayithe yemavuthundhi

[Female]

lokam lone verekaani premavuthundhi

[Male]

nijam cheppana cheli yeppudo

madhe meeti poyindhi prema

[Female]

ila haayiga mari thiyagaa

alai thaaki poyindhi prema

[Male]

ilage ilage ilage

preminchesukundam ilage

[Female]

ilage ilage ilage

preminchesukundam ilage

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Abhi Manyudu Kadu Veedu Songs lyrics

Movie : Nijam

Song s: Abhimanyudu Kadu

Singer : Group Songs

Lyricist : Kulasekhar

abhimanyudu kaadu veedu

arjunudu kaadu

prajalandhari lona okadu

saamanyudu veedu

abhimanyudu laga veedu ardha gynani kaadu

arjunudiki aanadu srikrishnudu thodu

evvaranda ledhu ontaraithe kaadu

veera maatha penchina mana telugu bidda veedu

amma jeevitham thodu asalu vodipodu

entha shathruvainaa anthu thelchuthaadu

shakthi vundhi yukthi vundhi

gunde ninda dhammu vundhi

asthram vundhi lakshyam vundhi

mokkavoni dhiksha vundhi

aggi pidugu veedu

saamanyudu kaadu

dhebba thinna pulila ika dhukuthadu

abhimanyudu kaadu veedu

arjunudu kaadu

prajalandhari lona okadu

saamanyudu veedu

abhimanyudu laga veedu ardha gynani kaadu

arjunudiki aanadu srikrishnudu thodu

evvaranda ledhu

ontaraithe kaadu

veera maatha penchina mana telugu bidda veedu

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Chara Chara Pakindi Songs Lyrics

Movie : Nijam

Songs Chara Chara Pakindi

Singer : Gopi,Murthy,Usha,Rasi

Lyricist : Kulasekhar

[Female]

maa bava ki erra kokante chaala istam

bava ki istam kadha ani o roju

erra koka kattukoni thota lokellanu

bava thotalo na kosam edhuru chusthunaddu

erra kokalo nannu chudagaane bava kallu jigellannayi

bava ni chudagane na vollu jillumandhi

atu pakka bava itu pakka nenu

madhyalo sarruna sabdhamaindhi

bussuna paamu padagetthindhi

kallu rendu gattiga musukunnanu

[Chorus]

o lammo aa tharuvatha paamu em chesindhe malli

[Female]

charachara paakindi gaja gaja vonikaanu

kaliki thagilindi gada gada laadanu

pai pai kochindi bitthara poyaanu

kitha kitha lettindhi thikamaka paddanu

kokodhilesi parigethhanu

thotodhilesi roaddekkanu

chettekkanu puttekkanu gattekkanu mettekkanu

ekkadi kelithe akkadi kochhi kalu velu chuttesindhayyo

[Chorus]

hai hai hai hai inkhesuko

[Female]

abba naagu paamu kattu vesindhoyi

kanne gundelona kaaka repindhoyi

dhaani kaatu guda kammaga vundhoyi

abba noppi kuda sammaga vundhoyi

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Rangu Rangula Mugulu Songs Lyrics

Movie : Nijam

Songs : Rangu Rangu

Singers : Rp Patnaik

Lyricist : Kula Sekhar

[Chorus]

rangu rangula mugullu mugullo muggullu

inti mundhara gobbillu gobbillo gobbillu

chitti papala navvullu

koti kanthula dhivvellu

[Male]

rama rama raghu rama ani

gajje kattu koni dappu pattu koni

vuru vaada thega chindhulaadarando o o o o oyi

ramudante ramudayyo pedha vaari dhevudayyo

sahasala veerudayyo saati leni surudayyo

seetha thoti bayitikocche

chethu lethhi pettayira dhandam

kaapadunu kodhandam

o sitha rama dhamaku dama dama dama dama dama dam

[Chorus]

o sitha rama dhamaku dama dama dama dama dama dam

badradri raama dhamaku dama dama dama dama dama dam
